text: Aylesford railway station is a railway station in Aylesford in Kent. The station is 30 minutes away from South Aylesford Retail Park. The station is on the Medway Valley Line. ==Services== Train services at Aylesford are run by Southeastern, they use EMUs. The off-peak service: * 2 trains per hour to * 2 trains per hour to via Some trains go to . On Sundays, the service is hourly. ==References== Category:Railway stations in Kent Category:1856 establishments in Europe Category:1850s establishments in England
title: Aylesford railway station
